backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.

frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive CSS variable theme definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, fonts, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component registering routes and rendering them inside an error boundary and layout.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamMember: Reusable layout component for displaying a team member with image and text, supporting reversed layout.
frontend/src/components/contact/ServiceS: Accordion-style dropdown listing legal services and allowing selection with validation styling.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that displays a styled fallback UI with reload option.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with contact info, social links, and hash‑based navigation to homepage sections.
frontend/src/components/home/AboutApproa: Homepage About section with firm overview and a CTA linking to the About page, plus an Approach features grid.
Renders an FAQ accordion with JSON-LD structured data and keyboard-accessible toggling.
frontend/src/components/home/FinalCtaSec: Displays a contact-focused call‑to‑action section with buttons that scroll or navigate to the contact area.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Provides the homepage hero banner with consultation and contact buttons that navigate or scroll to the contact form.

frontend/src/components/home/HowItWorksS: Shows a vertical step‑by‑step outline of the legal service process.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersSec: Displays a grid of partner organizations with names and categories.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesSec: Renders a services grid with icons and navigation handlers for exploring services or scrolling to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/home/Testimonial: Displays a testimonials section with client quotes in a responsive card grid.
frontend/src/components/home/TrustIntroS: Shows key trust indicators with icons and animated entries highlighting experience and results.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main layout with a navbar and smooth hash-based scrolling after navigation.

frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes actor and fetch status as a placeholder for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, theming variables, and utility classes for the frontend.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with firm values, team member listings, distinctive features, and navigation handlers for contact and services.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a consultation form with validation, submission handling, and UI sections for contact details and service selection.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the homepage by rendering multiple marketing sections including hero, services, testimonials, and a final CTA.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 page with messaging and a button to navigate back to the homepage.

frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a services overview with a hero section, service grid from servicesData, and a CTA button linking to the contact page.

frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, plugins, colors, fonts, and component styling settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature requests, and known issues regarding removing a specific H2 element on the About page. Contains versioning info, existing features, pending requests, and project configuration flags.
